title: Thunderbird does not sent emails from my @me.com (apple) account.
content:
Hello,

I hace installed the latest versoin of Thunderbird and set up my email account "@me.com" I can download emails and syncning works well, but I cannot send emails from Thunderbird. I have read various forums and tried numerous tips and suggestions to solve the problem but none of them work for me. Please see the attached picture of the error message I get. I have Thunderbird Version 115.2.3 (64-bit) on Windows 10 Enterprise 10.0.19045 I appreciate your help on fixing this issue since I really want to use Thunderbird, but without the ability to send email it is unfortunately not an option for me.

Many thanks in advance, René
creator: renemb

title: periodic filter not running on rss feed
content:
Hey,

I am trying to use a filter that runs periodically on an rss feed.

But it doesn't seem to want to run. (see image for filter settings)

When running it manually the filter works, so the matching criteria seem to be right. But it just doesn't execute the filter periodically. And the filter log doesn't indicate that the filter is even applied.

Running periodic filters on "normal" mail accounts is working fine.

So am I missing something in the settings or is this a bug or are periodic filters just not supposed to work with feeds?

thanks :)
creator: jjbbss

title: Download new messages, from the server that have already been downloaded by Thunderbird
content: Thunderbird did something strange to me today and it downloaded all the messages from the server again, except for today's, I entered the mail server and today's messages are there, I use thunderbird to manage my emails, I would need to force downloading the email messages that are on the server, with this I would ensure that today's messages are downloaded. The new ones do come in, but the messages prior to opening Thunderbird are not downloaded, because I understand that they are marked as having already been downloaded, I would like to force the download of all the messages found on the mail server . Please let me know if someone can help me.
creator: enrique.msg

title: descarga nuevamenes mensajes, del servidor que ya han sido descargado previamente por thunderbird
content: Me ha echo algo raro hoy el thunderbird y me ha vuelto a descargar todos los mensajes del servidor, menos los del día de hoy, he entrado en el servidor de correo y están los mensajes de hoy, utilizo thunderbird para gestionar mis correos, necesitaría forzar la descarga de los mensajes de correo que están en el servidor, con esto me aseguraria que se me descargan los mensajes de hoy. Los nuevos si que me entran, pero los mensajes anterior a la apertura de thunderbird, no se baja, porque entiendo que estan marcado como que ya se han descargado, me gustaria forzar la descarga de todos los mensajes que se encuentra en el servidor de correo. Por favor haber si alguien me puede ayudar.
creator: enrique.msg

title: missing emails in thunderbird INBOX
content: ‘I use thunderbird for my email, but yesterday only a few came into inbox and today none of any new ones are showing in INBOX? If I search I can find them and they say they are in the INBOX... Jan
creator: jan227

title: Thunderbird appears to have deleted emails from server!
content: Having used Thunderbird for some time, I installed it on a new PC, and found that virtually all my emails on a particular account seem to have been deleted, despite the app being set up to retain them. I checked on the webmail (BT) and they have gone. The account is set up as IMAP - as is another account on the same server, which seems OK. BT won't engage with me on this as they "don't support third party apps" I assume that 3 years worth of important client history is gone for ever? Can anyone suggest what I did wrong, or is this a software failure?
creator: grayfor

title: Update changed IMAP to POP, using Earthlink
content:
After the update to Thunderbird 115.2.3, Thunderbird downloaded and deleted messages I had left on the server. I use Earthlink as my email server. I should have realized what happened when I suddenly had over 2500 sets of duplicate emails.

It appears that my Thunderbird is now set up for POP, although it had been IMAP for years. This is the second (or third) time his has happened in the last 6 months.

Three questions: 1) Can I change back to IMAP from POP without losing more 2) Is there a way to restore any of these emails to the server? 3) How can I prevent this in the future; once I update and restart, it is too late to prevent something like this as the damage is done.

Thank you.
creator: msprinker

title: Help! Thunderbird is treating this like a brand new install
content: Somehow, Thunderbird updated to a new version. I didn't download or install a new version. I just closed and reopened it and it updated. When I tried to roll back to the new version, I lost all of my emails and addresses! I literally had tons of business emails and contacts and now they are gone. Thunderbird is treating this like a brand new install and I am having to set up all of my accounts all over again! Is there some way to get all of my stuff back? Or has the new install/rollback somehow written over all of my previous data?
creator: doncapps

title: Updated to Supernova 115.2.3. (64-bit). Calendar is empty/no data
content:
Updated Mac to Supernova 115.2.3 (64-bit). Calendar appears empty -- no data. Searched for solutions to no avail.

Added screenshot of [ Troubleshooting Information > Profile Folder > calendar-data ] below.

Please help.
creator: abogner

title: Junk button
content: Just updated to 115.2.3 (64-bit) before the JUNK button used to switch between JUNK and NOT JUNK depending if the email was one or the other, now the button does junk only and doesnt change when a junk email is highlighted
